subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Unexpected aspects of the 469
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I haven't experienced the EVP/ITC, but many cemeteries have guardians that 
try to ward you off in various ways.  From my experience, if they finally 
decide you're not there to do harm they will kind of back off and leave 
you alone.

A simple thing like straightening a skewed tombstone or cleaning up a mess 
will convince them you're not there to harm. Also, tell them that you're 
not there to do damage.

Zack

On Mon, 18 Aug 2008, Chad wrote:

> Just wondering if you guys have ever experienced anything like what
> I'm about to describe.
>
> I was doing an investigation at a cemetery the other night. My
> girlfriend was using the 469 with headphones. It started to spook her
> a little and she gave me the box. I put in the headphones and didn't
> hear anything out of the normal radio scan. Then I heard footsteps
> circling me. I started looking around and asked if anyone else was
> hearing them. I then got attacked by an entity in the cemetery. It
> felt a lot like a schoolyard bully circling you before he hits you,
> and then a big rush of  energy. I can't really describe the feeling.
>
> Then, the other night I was on a separate investigation and was in a
> bathroom. I was hearing water dripping, but when I checked the
> possible sources they were bone dry.
>
> Is it possible that these noises can come clearly through the 469? I
> do not have any psychic ability I know of. They are very real, and are
> definitely happening, not being imagined. Maybe it has something to do
> with the headphones? I cannot explain this. Have any of you had a
> similar experience?
>
>
> ------------------------------------
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
